basics.name: Executive Chef
basics.label: chef and culinary arts student
basics.summary: Outgoing professional offering extensive knowledge of hospitality etiquette, food preparation and superior customer service. A restaurant professional with years in FOH and BOH operations. Detailed-oriented with strong time management skills.

skills.name: Culinary Skills
keywords: MS Office Suite, POS Touch, Windows 7, Outlook and Excel spreadsheets expertise

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Catering Expert specializing in special events. Consulting Chef Food E-Commerce service. Responsible for managing culinary operations which includes recipe preparation and presentation, food consumption estimation, food purchase requisitioning and ensuring safety regulations. Managed catered boardroom events and both food and non-food inventories. Provided high quality customer service and satisfaction.
highlights: Over 12 years of experience in managing food operations as an Executive Kitchen Manager
Expert in managing new restaurant openings
Strong troubleshooting abilities to identify problems and implement appropriate solutions
Culinary Certified in food preparation and presentation
Created menus featuring various cuisines including Italian, Southern, American and Mexican Cuisines
Outstanding leadership skills proven through earned awards and employee relationships

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Collaborated with General Manager on all restaurant operations which includes managing customer service & wait staff, supervising daily activities, managing food and labor costs. Ensured adherence to health code. Consistently achieved bonuses for meeting and exceeding sales & cost controls quotas.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for the BOH operations. Managed 38 employees and inspected work performance, safety and hygiene according to government regulations. Ensured accurate food consumption and requisitioning of supplies. Assisted in the Grand Opening of eight new restaurants.

courses: Coursework in Business Management and Operations
Coursework in Culinary Management and Food and Beverage Operations Management
